text: Approval for the ACS RX Rocket(TM) and ACS Avenger(TM) Coronary Dilatation Catheters.  The device is indicated for: 1)balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for ht epurpose of improving myocardial perfusion; and 2) balloon dilatation of a coronary artery occlusion for the purpose of restoring coronary flow in patients with S-T segment elevation myocardial infarction.
